44 struct CameraInfo{
45  char* cameraId;
46  int supportResolution;
47  int supportSpecialEffects;
48  unsigned long exposureValueMax;
49  unsigned int exposureValueMin;
50  unsigned int gainValueMax;
51  unsigned int gainValueMin;
52  unsigned char supportFocus;
53  unsigned char supportSharpness;
54  unsigned char deviceAddress;
55 };

61 typedef enum
62 {
63  CAM_ERR_SUCCESS = 0,
64  CAM_ERR_NO_CALLBACK= -1,
65 }CamStatus;

72 typedef enum {
73  CAM_IMAGE_MODE_QQVGA =0x00,
74  CAM_IMAGE_MODE_QVGA = 0x01,
75  CAM_IMAGE_MODE_VGA = 0x02,
76  CAM_IMAGE_MODE_SVGA = 0x03,
77  CAM_IMAGE_MODE_HD = 0x04,
78  CAM_IMAGE_MODE_SXGAM = 0x05,
79  CAM_IMAGE_MODE_UXGA = 0x06,
80  CAM_IMAGE_MODE_FHD = 0x07,
81  CAM_IMAGE_MODE_QXGA = 0x08,
82  CAM_IMAGE_MODE_WQXGA2 = 0x09,
83  CAM_IMAGE_MODE_9 = 0x0a,
84  CAM_IMAGE_MODE_10 = 0x0b,
86  CAM_IMAGE_MODE_11 = 0x0c,
87  CAM_IMAGE_MODE_12 = 0x0d,
88  CAM_IMAGE_MODE_13 = 0x0e,
89  CAM_IMAGE_MODE_14 = 0x0f,
90  CAM_IMAGE_MODE_15 = 0x10,
91 }CAM_IMAGE_MODE;

225 typedef uint8_t (*BUFFER_CALLBACK)(uint8_t*buffer, uint8_t lenght);
234 typedef struct {
235  int csPin;
236  uint32_t totalLength;
237  uint32_t receivedLength;
238  uint8_t blockSize;
239  uint8_t cameraId;
240  uint8_t cameraDataFormat;
241  uint8_t burstFirstFlag;
242  uint8_t previewMode;
243  uint8_t currentPixelFormat;
244  uint8_t currentPictureMode;
245  struct CameraInfo myCameraInfo;
246  const struct CameraOperations* arducamCameraOp;
247  BUFFER_CALLBACK callBackFunction;
248 }ArducamCamera;
249 
250 
252 struct CameraOperations{
253  CamStatus (*begin)(ArducamCamera*);
254  CamStatus (*takePicture)(ArducamCamera*,CAM_IMAGE_MODE,CAM_IMAGE_PIX_FMT);
255  CamStatus (*takeMultiPictures)(ArducamCamera*,CAM_IMAGE_MODE,CAM_IMAGE_PIX_FMT,uint8_t);
256  CamStatus (*startPreview)(ArducamCamera*,CAM_VIDEO_MODE);
257  CamStatus (*stopPreview)(ArducamCamera*);
258  CamStatus (*setAutoExposure)(ArducamCamera*,uint8_t);
259  CamStatus (*setAbsoluteExposure)(ArducamCamera*,uint32_t);
260  CamStatus (*setAutoISOSensitive)(ArducamCamera*,uint8_t);
261  CamStatus (*setISOSensitivity)(ArducamCamera*,int);
262  CamStatus (*setAutoWhiteBalance)(ArducamCamera*,uint8_t);
263  CamStatus (*setAutoWhiteBalanceMode)(ArducamCamera*,CAM_WHITE_BALANCE);
264  CamStatus (*setColorEffect)(ArducamCamera*,CAM_COLOR_FX);
265  CamStatus (*setAutoFocus)(ArducamCamera*,uint8_t);
266  CamStatus (*setSaturation)(ArducamCamera*,CAM_STAURATION_LEVEL);
267  CamStatus (*setEV)(ArducamCamera*,CAM_EV_LEVEL);
268  CamStatus (*setContrast)(ArducamCamera*,CAM_CONTRAST_LEVEL);
269  CamStatus (*setBrightness)(ArducamCamera*,CAM_BRIGHTNESS_LEVEL);
270  CamStatus (*setSharpness)(ArducamCamera*,CAM_SHARPNESS_LEVEL);
271  uint32_t (*imageAvailable)(ArducamCamera*);
272  void (*csHigh)(ArducamCamera*);
273  void (*csLow)(ArducamCamera*);
274  uint8_t (*readBuff)(ArducamCamera*,uint8_t*,uint8_t);
275  uint8_t (*readByte)(ArducamCamera*);
276  void (*debugWriteRegister)(ArducamCamera*,uint8_t*);
277  void (*writeReg)(ArducamCamera*,uint8_t,uint8_t);
278  uint8_t (*readReg)(ArducamCamera*,uint8_t);
279  uint8_t (*busRead)(ArducamCamera*,int);
280  uint8_t (*busWrite)(ArducamCamera*,int,int);
281  void (*flushFifo)(ArducamCamera*);
282  void (*startCapture)(ArducamCamera*);
283  void (*clearFifoFlag)(ArducamCamera*);
284  uint32_t (*readFifoLength)(ArducamCamera*);
285  uint8_t (*getBit)(ArducamCamera*,uint8_t,uint8_t);
286  void (*setFifoBurst)(ArducamCamera*);
287  void (*setCapture)(ArducamCamera*);
288  void (*waitI2cIdle)(ArducamCamera*);
289  void (*lowPowerOn)(ArducamCamera*);
290  void (*lowPowerOff)(ArducamCamera*);
291  void (*registerCallback)(ArducamCamera*,BUFFER_CALLBACK,uint8_t);
292 };
